body_html:
Thanks for your explanation, @yaroslavvb .

I agree that migrating reshape will introduce duplicate code and increase maintain cost, so I'd like to try to fix it in tensor_util.make_tensor_proto as well. If success, another PR will be opened, see #12513 .

Anyway, if you have any new idea / suggestion, please tell me. I'd like to take a try.

Running all test locally is time-consuming, hence only several unit tests are selected by me to be tested at first. By the way, could you tell me how to run doctest? Thanks.

Running all test locally is time-consuming, hence only several unit tests are selected by me to be tested at first. By the way, could you tell me how to run doctest? Thanks.
body:
Thanks for your explanation, @yaroslavvb . 

I agree that migrating `reshape` will introduce duplicate code and increase maintain cost, so I'd like to try to fix it in `tensor_util.make_tensor_proto` as well. If success, another PR will be opened, see #12513 .

Anyway, if you have any new idea / suggestion, please tell me. I'd like to take a try.

Running all test locally is time-consuming, hence only several unit tests are selected by me to be tested at first. By the way, could you tell me how to run doctest? Thanks.
